title: Urgot is Love Urgot is Life
body:
I loved League of Legends so much I had all the Champs and Skins
I pray to Rito every night before bed, thanking them for the life I've been given
Of all the Champs I owned Urgot was my favourite
"Urgot is love" I say. "Urgot is life"
My nooby Father hears me and he calls me a scrub
I knew he was just jealous of my Diamond 5 rank
I called him a Pleb
He tells me to 1v1 him Summoner's Rift then sends me to sleep
I'm salty now my pride hurts
I lay in bed and it's really cold
A warmth is moving towards me
I feel something touch me
It's Urgot
He Whispers in my ear, "this is my lane"
He grabs me with his rusty metal claws and puts me on the computer chair
I'm ready to play

He ganks my lane
I use both of my Summoners for Urgot
The enemy is so fed but I go in for Urgot
I see my HP dropping as my Sterak's procs
I button mash with all my might
I Face of the Mountain Urgot
He ults his mighty ult as the enemy team surrenders
My nooby Father walks in
Urgot spams the chat with toxicity and says "GG EZ!"
Urgot Teleports outside of my window after channelling for 3.5 seconds
"Urgot is Love, Urgot is Life"
Then I walked to Piltover and got some Milk (Proving this is in Runeterra)

replies.body:
{{champion:14}} I thought we were friends. Turns out you were seeing another ugly abomination?!
{{champion:6}} Sorry Baby
{{champion:14}} I gave you my love and you threw it at this Plupadew... thing!
{{champion:6}} Baby, forgive me!
{{item:3070}} They Never returned from their hiking trip {{item:3070}}
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}  this is so kawaiiiiiiiiiiii!!!! best thing i have ever seen!!!!
Plot twist:And then op cut off his legs and gave them to the crabman
LOL I am converted. Take me to our new god.
Why has nobody done a story about how {{champion:104}} loses his cigar?
